books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: This portrait of Berlin during the rise of the Nazis centers on William E. Dodd, who became U.S. ambassador there in 1933.
books.name: IN THE GARDEN OF BEASTS

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former Saturday Night Live star and creator of "30 Rock."
books.name: BOSSYPANTS

books.author: by James Andrew Miller and Tom Shales
books.description: An oral history of the sports network ESPN.
books.name: THOSE GUYS HAVE ALL THE FUN

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The historian explores the extensive intellectual legacy that France settled on its 19th-century American visitors.
books.name: THE GREATER JOURNEY

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Chelsea Handler
books.description: Handler’s friends, family members and colleagues write about being victims of her practical jokes.
books.name: LIES THAT CHELSEA HANDLER TOLD ME

books.author: by Steven Tyler with David Dalton
books.description: The singer recounts the meteoric rise, fall and rise of Aerosmith over the last three decades.
books.name: DOES THE NOISE IN MY HEAD BOTHER YOU?

books.author: by Howard E. Wasdin and Stephen Templin
books.description: An expert sniper and former member of the Navy Seals recounts his military training and missions, including the battle of Mogadishu in 1993.
books.name: SEAL TEAM SIX

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were extensively cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Annie Jacobsen
books.description: An account of the mysterious military installation, which the author contends is the home of secret espionage programs.
books.name: AREA 51

books.author: by Jimmy Fallon with the writers of "Late Night"
books.description: Many things give the TV host opportunities to be grateful.
books.name: THANK YOU NOTES

books.author: by Rob Lowe
books.description: The actor charts his professional path, from teen idol to "The West Wing."
books.name: STORIES I ONLY TELL MY FRIENDS

books.author: by Jon Ronson
books.description: A look into a potential hoax in the scientific community spurs a journey into the world of psychopathy.
books.name: THE PSYCHOPATH TEST

books.author: by Mitchell Zuckoff
books.description: After a jungle plane crash in 1945, three survivors were caught between headhunters and enemy Japanese.
books.name: LOST IN SHANGRI-LA
